org.codice.ddf.platform.filter.delegate

Class FilterInjector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.ddf.platform.filter.delegate.FilterInjector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.framework.hooks.service.EventListenerHook

    public class FilterInjector
extends Object
implements org.osgi.framework.hooks.service.EventListenerHook
    Injects the DelegateServletFilter into the ServletContext with properties filterName = DELEGATING_FILTER, urlPatterns = ALL_URLS, and no servlet name as the ServletContext is being created. Sets up all Servlets with the DelegateServletFilter as the first in the FilterChain.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FilterInjector(javax.servlet.Filter filter)
      Creates a new filter injector with the specified filter.
